name: KIKI W.
body: I've used these guys multiple times! Always so friendly and very helpful. Great price, great service. Couldn't recommend them more.

name: JIM Q
body: Luis and Miguel did an excellent job! They were both very professional, courteous and on-time. Strong, like two Vikings, the two made my move from an upstairs apartment look like a breeze. I gave them both instructions only once at the beginning of the move and then I sat back and relaxed while they did all the work. Luis and Miguel remembered everything I instructed with no need for me to repeat myself. They used their professional experience to move items quickly and efficiently. This is the second time I have used Viking, and I'll surely use them again! They are the moving heroes!  - Thank you Viking!

name: Kandis M
body: Joshua was AWESOME!! He moved me in April on the 20th and then moved my auntie a week later on the 27th. There was an issue at the apartment she rented so he had to move her stuff again but to a storage and then to her new place a week after that in May.
